   22: -module(ssl_cert_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   28: -include("ssl_record.hrl").
   29: 
   30: %% Common test
   31: -export([all/0,
   32:          groups/0,
   33:          init_per_suite/1,
   34:          init_per_group/2,
   35:          init_per_testcase/2,
   36:          end_per_suite/1,
   37:          end_per_group/2,
   38:          end_per_testcase/2
   39:         ]).
   40: 
   41: %% Test cases
   42: -export([no_auth/0,
   43:          no_auth/1,
   44:          auth/0,
   45:          auth/1,
   46:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/0,
   47:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/1,
   48:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/0,
   49:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/1,
   50:          client_auth_no_suitable_chain/0,
   51:          client_auth_no_suitable_chain/1,
   52:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/0,
   53:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/1,
   54:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/0,
   55:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/1,
   56:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/0,
   57:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/1,
   58:          client_auth_sni/0,
   59:          client_auth_sni/1,
   60:          client_auth_seelfsigned_peer/0,
   61:          client_auth_seelfsigned_peer/1,
   62:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/0,
   63:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/1,
   64:          missing_root_cert_auth/0,
   65:          missing_root_cert_auth/1,
   66:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept/0,
   67:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept/1,
   68:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject/0,
   69:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject/1,
   70:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept/0,
   71:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept/1,
   72:          verify_fun_always_run_client/0,
   73:          verify_fun_always_run_client/1,
   74:          verify_fun_always_run_server/0,
   75:          verify_fun_always_run_server/1,
   76:          incomplete_chain_auth/0,
   77:          incomplete_chain_auth/1,
   78:          no_chain_client_auth/0,
   79:          no_chain_client_auth/1,
   80:          invalid_signature_client/0,
   81:          invalid_signature_client/1,
   82:          invalid_signature_server/0,
   83:          invalid_signature_server/1,
   84:          critical_extension_auth/0,
   85:          critical_extension_auth/1,
   86:          critical_extension_client_auth/0,
   87:          critical_extension_client_auth/1,
   88:          critical_extension_no_auth/0,
   89:          critical_extension_no_auth/1,
   90:          extended_key_usage_auth/0,
   91:          extended_key_usage_auth/1,
   92:          extended_key_usage_client_auth/0,
   93:          extended_key_usage_client_auth/1,
   94:          cert_expired/0,
   95:          cert_expired/1,
   96:          no_auth_key_identifier_ext/0,
   97:          no_auth_key_identifier_ext/1,
   98:          no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment/0,
   99:          no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment/1,
  100:          unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth/0,
  101:          unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth/1,
  102:          unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth/0,
  103:          unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth/1,
  104:          longer_chain/0,
  105:          longer_chain/1,
  106:          cross_signed_chain/0,
  107:          cross_signed_chain/1,
  108:          expired_root_with_cross_signed_root/0,
  109:          expired_root_with_cross_signed_root/1,
  110:          key_auth_ext_sign_only/0,
  111:          key_auth_ext_sign_only/1,
  112:          hello_retry_request/0,
  113:          hello_retry_request/1,
  114:          custom_groups/0,
  115:          custom_groups/1,
  116:          hello_retry_client_auth/0,
  117:          hello_retry_client_auth/1,
  118:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/0,
  119:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/1,
  120:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/0,
  121:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/1,
  122:          basic_rsa_1024/0,
  123:          basic_rsa_1024/1,
  124:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1/0,
  125:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1/1,
  126:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1/0,
  127:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1/1,
  128:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1/0,
  129:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1/1,
  130:          server_certificate_authorities_disabled/0,
  131:          server_certificate_authorities_disabled/1,
  132:          cert_auth_in_first_ca/0,
  133:          cert_auth_in_first_ca/1
  134:          ]).
  135: 
  136: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  137: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
  138: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  139: 
  140: all() ->
  141:     [
  142:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  143:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  144:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  145:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
  146:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
  147:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
  148:     ].
  149: 
  150: groups() ->
  151:     [
  152:      {'tlsv1.3', [], tls_1_3_protocol_groups()}, 
  153:      {'tlsv1.2', [], tls_1_2_protocol_groups()},
  154:      {'tlsv1.1', [], ssl_protocol_groups()},
  155:      {'tlsv1', [], ssl_protocol_groups()},
  156:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], tls_1_2_protocol_groups()},
  157:      {'dtlsv1', [], ssl_protocol_groups()},
  158:      {rsa, [], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++ pre_tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ++ [client_auth_seelfsigned_peer]},
  159:      {ecdsa, [], all_version_tests()},
  160:      {dsa, [], all_version_tests()},
  161:      {rsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++
  162:           tls_1_3_tests() ++ tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ++ [client_auth_seelfsigned_peer, basic_rsa_1024]},
  163:      {rsa_pss_rsae, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_2_rsa_tests()},
  164:      {rsa_pss_rsae_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests() ++ tls_1_3_rsa_tests()},
  165:      {rsa_pss_pss, [], all_version_tests()},
  166:      {rsa_pss_pss_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests() ++ tls_1_3_rsa_tests()},
  167:      {ecdsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests() ++
  168:           [signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1,
  169:            signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1,
  170:            signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1]},
  171:      {eddsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()}
  172:     ].
  173: 
  174: ssl_protocol_groups() ->
  175:     [{group, rsa},
  176:      {group, dsa}].
  177: 
  178: tls_1_2_protocol_groups() ->
  179:     [{group, rsa},
  180:      {group, ecdsa},
  181:      {group, dsa},
  182:      {group, rsa_pss_rsae},
  183:      {group, rsa_pss_pss}
  184:     ].
  185: 
  186: tls_1_3_protocol_groups() ->
  187:     [{group, rsa_1_3},
  188:      {group, ecdsa_1_3},
  189:      {group, eddsa_1_3},
  190:      {group, rsa_pss_rsae_1_3},
  191:      {group, rsa_pss_pss_1_3}
  192:     ].
  193: 
  194: tls_1_3_tests() ->
  195:     [
  196:      hello_retry_request,
  197:      custom_groups,
  198:      client_auth_no_suitable_chain,
  199:      cert_auth_in_first_ca,
  200:      hello_retry_client_auth,
  201:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted,
  202:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected,
  203:      server_certificate_authorities_disabled
  204:     ].
  205: 
  206: pre_tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ->
  207:     [
  208:      key_auth_ext_sign_only
  209:     ].
  210: 
  211: rsa_tests() ->
  212:    [
  213:     longer_chain,
  214:     cross_signed_chain,
  215:     expired_root_with_cross_signed_root
  216:    ].
  217: 
  218: tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ->
  219:      [
  220:       unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth,
  221:       unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth
  222:      ].
  223: 
  224: tls_1_2_rsa_tests() ->
  225:      [
  226:       unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth,
  227:       unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth
  228:      ].
  229: 
  230: all_version_tests() ->
  231:     [
  232:      no_auth,
  233:      auth,
  234:      client_auth_empty_cert_accepted,
  235:      client_auth_empty_cert_rejected,
  236:      client_auth_use_partial_chain,
  237:      client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain,
  238:      client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail,
  239:      client_auth_sni,
  240:      missing_root_cert_no_auth,
  241:      missing_root_cert_auth,
  242:      missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept,
  243:      missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject,
  244:      missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept,
  245:      verify_fun_always_run_client,
  246:      verify_fun_always_run_server,
  247:      incomplete_chain_auth,
  248:      no_chain_client_auth,
  249:      invalid_signature_client,
  250:      invalid_signature_server,
  251:      critical_extension_auth,
  252:      critical_extension_client_auth,
  253:      critical_extension_no_auth,
  254:      extended_key_usage_auth,
  255:      extended_key_usage_client_auth,
  256:      cert_expired,
  257:      no_auth_key_identifier_ext,
  258:      no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment
  259:     ].
  260: 
  261: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  262:     catch crypto:stop(),
  263:     try crypto:start() of
  264: 	ok ->
  265:             Config
  266:     catch _:_ ->
  267: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  268:     end.
  269: 
  270: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  271:     ssl:stop(),
  272:     application:unload(ssl),
  273:     application:stop(crypto).
  274: 
  275: 
  276: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  277:     case ssl_test_lib:is_protocol_version(GroupName) of
  278:         true  ->
  279:             ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  280:             ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName,
  281:                                         [{client_type, erlang},
  282:                                          {server_type, erlang},
  283:                                          {version, GroupName} | Config]);
  284:         false ->
  285:             do_init_per_group(GroupName, Config)
  286:     end.
  287: 
  288: do_init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == rsa;
  289:                                        Group == rsa_1_3 ->
  290:     Config1 = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  291:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_1024_cert(Config1),
  292:     COpts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  293:     SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  294:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  295:     [{cert_key_alg, rsa},
  296:      {extra_client, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version)},
  297:      {extra_server, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version)} |
  298:      lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  299:                   [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  300:                    {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  301:                    lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  302:                                 lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  303: do_init_per_group(Alg, Config) when Alg == rsa_pss_rsae;
  304:                                     Alg == rsa_pss_pss ->
  305:     Supports = crypto:supports(),
  306:     RSAOpts = proplists:get_value(rsa_opts, Supports),
  307:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  308: 
  309:     case lists:member(rsa_pkcs1_pss_padding, RSAOpts)
  310:         andalso lists:member(rsa_pss_saltlen, RSAOpts)
  311:         andalso lists:member(rsa_mgf1_md, RSAOpts) of
  312:         true ->
  313:             #{client_config := COpts,
  314:               server_config := SOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_alg(Alg), [], Config, ""),
  315:             [{cert_key_alg, Alg},
  316:              {extra_client, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version)},
  317:              {extra_server, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version)} |
  318:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  319:                           [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  320:                            {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  321:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  322:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  323:         false ->
  324:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  325:     end;
  326: do_init_per_group(Alg, Config) when Alg == rsa_pss_rsae_1_3;
  327:                                     Alg == rsa_pss_pss_1_3 ->
  328: 
  329:     Supports = crypto:supports(),
  330:     RSAOpts = proplists:get_value(rsa_opts, Supports),
  331:     
  332:     case lists:member(rsa_pkcs1_pss_padding, RSAOpts) 
  333:         andalso lists:member(rsa_pss_saltlen, RSAOpts) 
  334:         andalso lists:member(rsa_mgf1_md, RSAOpts) of
  335:         true ->
  336:             #{client_config := COpts,
  337:               server_config := SOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_alg(Alg), [], Config, ""),
  338:             [{cert_key_alg, rsa_alg(Alg)} |
  339:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  340:                           [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  341:                            {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  342:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  343:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  344:         false ->
  345:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  346:     end;
  347: do_init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == ecdsa;
  348:                                        Group == ecdsa_1_3 ->
  349: 
  350:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  351:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse lists:member(dh, PKAlg)) of
  352:         true ->
  353:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  354:             COpts = proplists:get_value(client_ecdsa_verify_opts, Config),
  355:             SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  356:             [{cert_key_alg, ecdsa} |
  357:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  358:                           [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  359:                            {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  360:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  361:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))]
  362:                          )];
  363:         false ->
  364:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  365:     end;
  366: do_init_per_group(eddsa_1_3, Config0) ->
  367:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  368:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config0),
  369:     case lists:member(eddsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg)) of
  370:         true ->
  371:             Conf = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
  372:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
  373:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()},
  374:                                                client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
  375:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
  376:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()}}),
  377:             [{server_config, SOpts},
  378:              {client_config, COpts}] = x509_test:gen_pem_config_files(Conf, filename:join(PrivDir, "client_eddsa"),
  379:                                                                       filename:join(PrivDir, "server_eddsa")),
  380: 
  381:             [{cert_key_alg, eddsa} |
  382:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  383:                           [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  384:                            {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  385:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  386:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config0))]
  387:                          )];
  388:         false ->
  389:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  390:     end;
  391: do_init_per_group(dsa = Alg, Config0) ->
  392:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  393:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config0)),
  394:     case lists:member(dss, PKAlg) andalso lists:member(dh, PKAlg) of
  395:         true ->
  396:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_dsa_cert(Config0),
  397:             COpts = proplists:get_value(client_dsa_opts, Config),
  398:             SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_dsa_opts, Config),
  399:             [{cert_key_alg, dsa},
  400:              {extra_client, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version) ++
  401:                   [{ciphers, ssl_test_lib:dsa_suites(Version)}]},
  402:              {extra_server, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version) ++
  403:                   [{ciphers, ssl_test_lib:dsa_suites(Version)}]} |
  404:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  405:                           [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  406:                            {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  407:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  408:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  409:         false ->
  410:             {skip, "Missing DSS crypto support"}
  411:     end;
  412: do_init_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
  413:     Config.
  414: 
  415: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  416:   ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  417: 
  418: init_per_testcase(signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1, Config) ->
  419:     init_ecdsa_opts(Config, secp256r1);
  420: init_per_testcase(signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1, Config) ->
  421:     init_ecdsa_opts(Config, secp384r1);
  422: init_per_testcase(signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1, Config) ->
  423:     init_ecdsa_opts(Config, secp521r1);
  424: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  425:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  426:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  427:     Config.
  428: 
  429: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  430:     Config.
  431: 
  432: init_ecdsa_opts(Config0, Curve) ->
  433:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config0)),
  434:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  435:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse lists:member(dh, PKAlg)) of
  436:         true ->
  437:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_ecdsa_cert(Config0, Curve),
  438:             COpts = proplists:get_value(client_ecdsa_verify_opts, Config),
  439:             SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  440:             [{cert_key_alg, ecdsa} |
  441:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  442:                           [{client_cert_opts, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(ecdsa, Version) ++ COpts},
  443:                            {server_cert_opts, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(ecdsa, Version) ++ SOpts} |
  444:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  445:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))]
  446:                          )];
  447:         false ->
  448:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  449:     end.
  450: 
  451: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  452: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  453: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  454: no_auth() ->
  455:      ssl_cert_tests:no_auth().
  456: 
  457: no_auth(Config) ->
  458:       ssl_cert_tests:no_auth(Config).
  459: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  460: auth() ->
  461:     ssl_cert_tests:auth().
  462: auth(Config) ->
  463:     ssl_cert_tests:auth(Config).
  464: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  465: client_auth_empty_cert_accepted() ->
  466:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_accepted().
  467: client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config) ->
  468:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config).
  469: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  470: client_auth_empty_cert_rejected() ->
  471:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_rejected().
  472: client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config) ->
  473:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config).
  474: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  475: client_auth_no_suitable_chain() ->
  476:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_no_suitable_chain().
  477: client_auth_no_suitable_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  478:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_no_suitable_chain(Config).
  479: 
  480: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  481: client_auth_use_partial_chain() ->
  482:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_use_partial_chain().
  483: client_auth_use_partial_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  484:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_use_partial_chain(Config).
  485: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------

  487:    ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain().
  488: client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  489:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain(Config).
  490:

  514: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  515: missing_root_cert_auth() ->
  516:     [{doc,"Must have ROOT certs to be able to verify verify peer"}].
  517: missing_root_cert_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  518:     ServerOpts =  proplists:delete(cacertfile, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config)),
  519:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, _} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  520:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  521:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  522: 					      {from, self()},
  523: 					      {options, no_reuse(Version) ++ [{verify, verify_peer}
  524:                                                                              | ServerOpts]}]),
  525: 
  526:     Error = {error, {options, incompatible,
  527:                      [{verify,verify_peer},{cacerts,undefined}]}},
  528:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, Error),
  529:     
  530:     ClientOpts =  proplists:delete(cacertfile, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config)),
  531:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  532: 					      {from, self()},
  533: 					      {options, [{verify, verify_peer}
  534: 							 | ClientOpts]}]),
  535: 
  536:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, Error).
  537:     
  538: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  539: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept() ->
  540:     [{doc, "Test that the client succeeds if the ROOT CA is unknown in verify_peer mode"
  541:      " with a verify_fun that accepts the unknown CA error"}].
  542: 
  543: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept(Config) ->
  544:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  545:     ClientCaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
  546:     FunAndState =  {fun(_,{bad_cert, unknown_ca}, UserState) ->
  547: 			    {valid, UserState};
  548: 		       (_,{bad_cert, _} = Reason, _) ->
  549: 			    {fail, Reason};
  550: 		       (_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
  551: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  552: 		       (_, valid, UserState) ->
  553: 			    {valid, UserState};
  554: 		       (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  555: 			    {valid, UserState}
  556: 		    end, []},
  557:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client,
  558:                                           [{verify, verify_peer}, {verify_fun, FunAndState},
  559:                                            {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}],
  560:                                           Config),
  561:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  562: 
  563: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  564: missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept() ->
  565:     [{doc, "Test old style verify fun"}].
  566: 
  567: missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept(Config) ->
  568:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  569:     ClientCaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
  570:     AcceptBadCa = fun({bad_cert,unknown_ca}, Acc) ->  Acc;
  571:                      (Other, Acc) -> [Other | Acc]
  572: 		  end,
  573:     VerifyFun =
  574: 	fun(ErrorList) ->
  575: 		case lists:foldl(AcceptBadCa, [], ErrorList) of
  576: 		    [] ->    true;
  577: 		    [_|_] -> false
  578: 		end
  579: 	end,
  580:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client,
  581:                                           [{verify, verify_peer},
  582:                                            {verify_fun, VerifyFun},
  583:                                            {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}], Config),
  584:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  585: 
  586: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  587: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject() ->
  588:     [{doc, "Test that the client fails if the ROOT CA is unknown in verify_peer mode"
  589:      " with a verify_fun that rejects the unknown CA error"}].
  590: 
  591: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject(Config) ->
  592:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  593:     ClientCaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
  594:     FunAndState =  {fun(_,{bad_cert, unknown_ca} = Reason, _UserState) ->
  595: 			    {fail, Reason};
  596: 		       (_,{bad_cert, _} = Reason, _) ->
  597: 			    {fail, Reason};
  598: 		       (_,{extension, UserState}, _) ->
  599: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  600: 		       (_, valid, UserState) ->
  601: 			    {valid, UserState};
  602: 		       (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  603: 			    {valid, UserState}
  604: 		    end, []},
  605:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client,
  606:                                           [{verify, verify_peer},
  607:                                            {verify_fun, FunAndState},
  608:                                            {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}],
  609:                                           Config),
  610:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, unknown_ca).
  611: 
  612: 
  613: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  614: incomplete_chain_auth() ->
  615:     [{doc,"Test that we can verify an incompleat chain when we have the certs to rebuild it"}].
  616: incomplete_chain_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  617:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  618:     Group = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  619:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(Group),
  620:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  621:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  622:                                                                         [{server_chain, DefaultCertConf},
  623:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),   
  624:     [ServerRoot| _] = ServerCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
  625:     ClientCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
  626:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer},
  627:                                                          {cacerts,  ServerCas ++ ClientCas} |
  628:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts0)], Config),
  629:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer},
  630:                                                          {cacerts, [ServerRoot]} |
  631:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ServerOpts0)], Config),
  632:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  633: 
  634: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  635: no_chain_client_auth() ->
  636:     [{doc,"In TLS-1.3 test that we allow sending only peer cert if chain CAs are missing and hence"
  637:       " we can not determine if client is in servers auth domain or not, so send and hope"
  638:       " that the cert chain is in the auth domain and that the server possess "
  639:       " intermediates to recreate the chain."}].
  640: no_chain_client_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  641:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  642:     Group = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  643:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(Group),
  644:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  645:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  646:                                                                         [{server_chain, DefaultCertConf},
  647:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  648:     ServerCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
  649:     [ClientRoot| _] = ClientCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
  650:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer},
  651:                                                          {cacerts, [ClientRoot]} |
  652:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts0)], Config),
  653:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer},
  654:                                                          {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  655:                                                          {cacerts,  ClientCas ++ ServerCas} |
  656:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ServerOpts0)], Config),
  657:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  658: 
  659: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  660: verify_fun_always_run_client() ->
  661:     [{doc,"Verify that user verify_fun is always run (for valid and "
  662:       "valid_peer not only unknown_extension)"}].
  663: 
  664: verify_fun_always_run_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  665:     ClientOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  666:     ServerOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  667:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  668:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  669:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  670: 					      {from, self()},
  671: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  672: 						     no_result, []}},
  673: 					      {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ ServerOpts}]),
  674:     Port  = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  675: 
  676:     %% If user verify fun is called correctly we fail the connection.
  677:     %% otherwise we cannot tell this case apart form where we miss
  678:     %% to call users verify fun
  679:     FunAndState =  {fun(_, Der, {extension, _}, UserState) ->
  680:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  681: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  682: 		       (_, Der, valid, [ChainLen]) ->
  683:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  684: 			    {valid, [ChainLen + 1]};
  685: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, [1]) ->
  686:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  687: 			    {fail, "verify_fun_was_always_run"};
  688: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  689:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  690: 			    {valid, UserState}
  691: 		    end, [0]},
  692: 
  693:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  694: 					      {host, Hostname},
  695: 					      {from, self()},
  696: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  697: 						     no_result, []}},
  698: 					      {options,
  699: 					       [{verify, verify_peer},
  700: 						{verify_fun, FunAndState}
  701: 						| ClientOpts]}]),
  702: 
  703:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, handshake_failure).
  704: 
  705: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  706: verify_fun_always_run_server() ->
  707:     [{doc,"Verify that user verify_fun is always run (for valid and "
  708:       "valid_peer not only unknown_extension)"}].
  709: verify_fun_always_run_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  710:     ClientOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  711:     ServerOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  712:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  713: 
  714:     %% If user verify fun is called correctly we fail the connection.
  715:     %% otherwise we cannot tell this case apart form where we miss
  716:     %% to call users verify fun
  717:     FunAndState =  {fun(_, Der, {extension, _}, UserState) ->
  718:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  719: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  720: 		       (_, Der, valid, [ChainLen]) ->
  721:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  722: 			    {valid, [ChainLen + 1]};
  723: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, [1]) ->
  724:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  725: 			    {fail, "verify_fun_was_always_run"};
  726: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  727:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  728: 			    {valid, UserState}
  729: 		    end, [0]},
  730: 
  731:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  732:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  733: 					      {from, self()},
  734: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  735: 						     no_result, []}},
  736: 					      {options,
  737:                                                no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_peer},
  738:                                                                                 {verify_fun, FunAndState} |
  739:                                                                                 ServerOpts]}]),
  740:     Port  = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  741: 
  742:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  743: 					      {host, Hostname},
  744: 					      {from, self()},
  745: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  746: 						     no_result, []}},
  747: 					      {options, ClientOpts}]),
  748:     
  749:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, handshake_failure).
  750: 
  751: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------

  764: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  765: critical_extension_auth() ->
  766:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical unknown extension in verify_peer mode"}].
  767: 
  768: critical_extension_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  769:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  770:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  771:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{{2,16,840,1,113730,1,1}, <<3,2,6,192>>, true}]),
  772:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  773:       server_config := ServerOpts0}  = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  774:                                                                          [{server_chain, 
  775:                                                                            [[],[],[{extensions, Ext}]]},
  776:                                                                           {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  777:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  778:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  779:  
  780:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  781:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  782:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error(
  783:                [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  784:                 {from, self()},
  785:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  no_result, []}},
  786:                 {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts]}]),
  787:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  788:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error(
  789:                [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  790:                 {host, Hostname},
  791:                 {from, self()},
  792:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  793:                 {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
  794: 
  795:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, unsupported_certificate).
  796: 
  797: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  798: critical_extension_client_auth() ->
  799:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical unknown extension in verify_peer mode"}].
  800: 
  801: critical_extension_client_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  802:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  803:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{{2,16,840,1,113730,1,1}, <<3,2,6,192>>, true}]),
  804:      #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  805:       server_config := ServerOpts0}  = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  806:                                                                          [{client_chain, 
  807:                                                                            [[],[],[{extensions, Ext}]]},
  808:                                                                           {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  809:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  810:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  811:     
  812:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  813:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  814:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error(
  815:                [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  816:                 {from, self()},
  817:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  818:                 {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  819:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  820:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error(
  821:                [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  822:                 {host, Hostname},
  823:                 {from, self()},
  824:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  825:                 {options, [{verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts]}]),
  826: 
  827:     %% This certificate has a critical extension that we don't
  828:     %% understand.  Therefore, verification should fail.          
  829:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, unsupported_certificate).
  830:

  837:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  838:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{{2,16,840,1,113730,1,1}, <<3,2,6,192>>, true}]),
  839:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  840:       server_config := ServerOpts0}  = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  841:                                                                             [{server_chain, 
  842:                                                                               [[],[], [{extensions, Ext}]]},
  843:                                                                              {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),

  845:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_none} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],

  850: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  851: extended_key_usage_auth() ->
  852:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical extended_key_usage extension in server cert"}].
  853: 
  854: extended_key_usage_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  855:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  856:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  857:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  858:                                  [?'id-kp-serverAuth'], true}]),
  859:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  860:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  861:                                                                         [{server_chain, 
  862:                                                                           [[],[], [{extensions, Ext}]]},
  863:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}
  864:                                                                         ]),
  865:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  866:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  867: 
  868:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  869:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  870:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  871: 					{from, self()},
  872:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  873: 			   {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts]}]),
  874:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  875:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  876: 					{host, Hostname},
  877: 			   {from, self()},
  878:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  879: 					{options, [{verify, verify_peer} |
  880: 						   ClientOpts]}]),
  881:     
  882:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  883: 
  884:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  885:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  886: 
  887: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  888: extended_key_usage_client_auth() ->
  889:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical extended_key_usage extension in client and server cert"}].
  890: 
  891: extended_key_usage_client_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  892:     ServerExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  893:                                        [?'id-kp-serverAuth'], true}]),
  894:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  895:                                        [?'id-kp-clientAuth'], true}]),
  896:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  897:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  898:                                                                         [{client_chain, [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
  899:                                                                          {server_chain, [[],[],[{extensions, ServerExt}]]}]),
  900:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  901:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  902:    
  903:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  904:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  905:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  906: 					{from, self()},
  907:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  908:                                         {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  909:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  910:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  911: 					{host, Hostname},
  912: 			   {from, self()},
  913: 			   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  914: 					{options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
  915:     
  916:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  917: 
  918:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  919:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  920: 
  921: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  922: cert_expired() ->
  923:     [{doc,"Test server with expired certificate"}].
  924: 
  925: cert_expired(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  926:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  927:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  928:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
  929:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  930:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  931:                                                                         [{server_chain,
  932:                                                                           [[],
  933:                                                                            [{validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day},
  934:                                                                                         {Year-1, Month, Day}}}],
  935:                                                                            []
  936:                                                                      ]},
  937:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  938:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  939:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  940:     
  941:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  942:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  943:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  944: 					      {from, self()},
  945: 					      {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ ServerOpts}]),
  946:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  947:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  948: 					      {host, Hostname},
  949: 					      {from, self()},
  950: 					      {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),    
  951:     
  952:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, certificate_expired).
  953: 
  954: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  955: no_auth_key_identifier_ext() ->
  956:     [{doc, "Test cert that does not have authorityKeyIdentifier extension"}].
  957: 
  958: no_auth_key_identifier_ext(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  959:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  960:       #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  961:         server_config := ServerOpts0} = 
  962:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  963:                                           [{client_chain, DefaultCertConf},
  964:                                            {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  965:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config)],
  966:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
  967:  
  968:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  969:     
  970: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  971: no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment() ->
  972:     [{doc, "Test cert with keyEncipherment key_usage an no"
  973:       " authorityKeyIdentifier extension"}].
  974: 
  975: no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  976:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  977:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{key_usage, [digitalSignature, keyEncipherment]}]),
  978:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  979:         server_config := ServerOpts0} = 
  980:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  981:                                           [{client_chain, 
  982:                                             [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
  983:                                            {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}
  984:                                           ]),
  985:     ClientOpts =   [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config)],
  986:     ServerOpts =   [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
  987:     
  988:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  989: 
  990: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  991: key_auth_ext_sign_only() ->
  992:     [{doc, "Test that client with a certificate without keyEncipherment usage "
  993:     " extension can connect to a server with restricted cipher suites "}].
  994: key_auth_ext_sign_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  995:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  996:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{key_usage, [digitalSignature]}]),
  997:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  998:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = 
  999:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
 1000:                                           [{client_chain, 
 1001:                                             [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
 1002:                                            {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}
 1003:                                           ]),
 1004:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
 1005:     ClientOpts =  [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config)],
 1006:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {ciphers, 
 1007:                                           ssl_test_lib:rsa_non_signed_suites(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version))} 
 1008:                  | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
 1009:     
 1010:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1011: 
 1012: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1013: cert_auth_in_first_ca() ->
 1014:     [{doc,"Test cert auth will be available in first ca in chain, make it happen by only having one"}].
 1015: cert_auth_in_first_ca(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1016:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
 1017:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
 1018:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
 1019:                                                       intermediates => [[]],
 1020:                                                       peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]},
 1021:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}], 
 1022:                                                       intermediates => [[]],
 1023:                                                       peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]}}), 
 1024:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config)],
 1025:     ServerOpts =  [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config)],
 1026: 
 1027:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1028: 
 1029: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1030: 
 1031: 
 1032: longer_chain() ->
 1033:     [{doc,"Test depth option"}].
 1034: longer_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1035:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
 1036:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
 1037:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
 1038:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}],
 1039:                                                                         [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
 1040:                                                                         [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}]],
 1041:                                                       peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]},
 1042:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
 1043:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
 1044:                                                       peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]}}),
 1045:     [ServerRoot| _] = ServerCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
 1046:     ClientCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
 1047:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 1048:     
 1049:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [ServerRoot]} |
 1050:                                            proplists:delete(cacerts, ServerOpts0)] ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version), Config),
 1051:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer},
 1052:                                            {depth, 5},
 1053:                                            {cacerts,  ServerCas ++ ClientCas} |
 1054:                                            proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts0)]++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) , Config),
 1055:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1056: 
 1057: cross_signed_chain() ->
 1058:     [{doc, "Manual test of chain with duplicate entries that is cross signing certs are present."}].
 1059: cross_signed_chain(Config)
 1060:   when is_list(Config) ->
 1061:     Key1 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1),
 1062:     Key2 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2),
 1063:     Key3 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3),
 1064:     Key4 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4),
 1065:     Key5 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5),
 1066: 
 1067:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0, client_config := ClientOpts0} =
 1068:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, Key1}],
 1069:                                                       peer => [{key, Key5}]},
 1070:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, Key3}],
 1071:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, Key2}], [{key, Key3}]],
 1072:                                                       peer => [{key, Key1}]}}),
 1073: 
 1074:     #{client_config := ClientOptsNew} =
 1075:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, Key1}],
 1076:                                                       peer => [{key, Key5}]},
 1077:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, Key4}],
 1078:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, Key2}], [{key, Key1}]],
 1079:                                                       peer => [{key, Key1}]}}),
 1080: 
 1081:     ServerCas0 = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
 1082:     ClientCas0 = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
 1083:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 1084: 
 1085:     {[Peer,CI1,CI2,CROld], CROld} = chain_and_root(ClientOpts0),
 1086:     {[_Peer,CI1New,CI2New,CRNew], CRNew} = chain_and_root(ClientOptsNew),
 1087: 
 1088:     ServerCas = [CRNew|ServerCas0 -- [CROld]],
 1089:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer} |
 1090:                                                          lists:keyreplace(cacerts, 1, ServerOpts0, {cacerts, ServerCas})]
 1091:                                           ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version),
 1092:                                           Config),
 1093:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer} |
 1094:                                                          lists:keyreplace(cacerts, 1,
 1095:                                                                           lists:keyreplace(cert, 1, ClientOpts0,
 1096:                                                                              {cert, [Peer,CI1New,CI2New,CI1,CI2,CRNew,CROld]}),
 1097:                                                                           {cacerts, ClientCas0})] ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version),
 1098:                                           Config),
 1099:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
 1100:     ClientOpts2 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer} |
 1101:                                                           lists:keyreplace(cacerts, 1,
 1102:                                                                            lists:keyreplace(cert, 1, ClientOpts0,
 1103:                                                                                             {cert, [Peer,CI1,CI1New,CI2,CI2New,CROld,CRNew]}),
 1104:                                                                            {cacerts, ClientCas0})] ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version),
 1105:                                            Config),
 1106:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts2, ServerOpts, Config),
 1107:     ok.
 1108: 
 1109: expired_root_with_cross_signed_root() ->
 1110:     [{doc,"Test that we can verify a chain with an expired Root Cert if there is an alternative chain with"
 1111:       " a cross signed Root CA further down the chain that is however not present in the sent chain"}].
 1112: expired_root_with_cross_signed_root(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1113: 
 1114:     Key1 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1),
 1115:     Key2 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2),
 1116:     Key3 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3),
 1117:     Key4 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4),
 1118:     Key5 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5),
 1119:     Key6 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6),
 1120:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
 1121: 
 1122:     %% Create expired ROOT
 1123:     #{cert := Root} = SRoot = public_key:pkix_test_root_cert("OTP test server ROOT", [{key, Key1},
 1124:                                                                     {validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day},
 1125:                                                                                 {Year-1, Month, Day}}}]),
 1126:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0, client_config := ClientOpts0} =
 1127:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => SRoot,
 1128:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, Key2}], [{key, Key3}]],
 1129:                                                       peer => [{key, Key4}]},
 1130:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, Key5}],
 1131:                                                       peer => [{key, Key6}]}}),
 1132:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 1133:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ClientOpts0,
 1134:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ServerOpts0,
 1135: 
 1136:     SCert = proplists:get_value(cert, ServerOpts),
 1137:     SCerts = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts),
 1138: 
 1139:     {ok, ExtractedCAs} = ssl_pkix_db:extract_trusted_certs({der, SCerts}),
 1140:     {ok, Root, [_Peer, CA1, CA2, Root]} = ssl_certificate:certificate_chain(SCert, ets:new(foo, []), 
 1141:                                                                             ExtractedCAs, [], encoded),
 1142: 
 1143:     OTPCA1 = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(CA1, otp),
 1144:     OTPCA2 = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(CA2, otp),
 1145: 
 1146:     TBS1 = OTPCA1#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
 1147:     TBS2 = OTPCA2#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
 1148: 
 1149:     Issuer = TBS1#'OTPTBSCertificate'.issuer,
 1150: 
 1151:     SubjectPublicKeyInfo = TBS2#'OTPTBSCertificate'.subjectPublicKeyInfo,
 1152: 
 1153:     AltCrossRoot = public_key:pkix_sign(TBS1#'OTPTBSCertificate'{subject = Issuer,
 1154:                                                                  subjectPublicKeyInfo = SubjectPublicKeyInfo}, Key2),
 1155: 
 1156:     ClientCas0 = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts),
 1157: 
 1158:     %% Only expired ROOT present
 1159:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert([{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts], ServerOpts, Config, certificate_expired),
 1160:     %% Only CROSS ROOT present
 1161:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer},
 1162:                              {cacerts, [AltCrossRoot]} | proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts)], ServerOpts, Config),
 1163:     %% Both expired ROOT and CROSS ROOT present
 1164:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer},
 1165:                              {cacerts, [AltCrossRoot | ClientCas0]} | proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts)],
 1166:                             ServerOpts, Config).
 1167: 
 1168: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1169: %% TLS 1.3 Test cases  -----------------------------------------------
 1170: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1171: hello_retry_request() ->
 1172:     [{doc,"Test that ssl server can request a new group when the client's first key share"
 1173:       "is not supported"}].
 1174: 
 1175: hello_retry_request(Config) ->
 1176:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1177:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1178:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1179:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1180:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1181:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]} | ClientOpts0],
 1182:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1183: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1184: custom_groups() ->
 1185:     [{doc,"Test that ssl server can select a common group for key-exchange"}].
 1186: 
 1187: custom_groups(Config) ->
 1188:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1189:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1190: 
 1191:     %% Set versions
 1192:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1193:                   {supported_groups, [x448, secp256r1, secp384r1]}|ServerOpts0],
 1194:     ClientOpts1 = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
 1195:     ClientOpts = [{supported_groups,[secp384r1, secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts1],
 1196:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1197: 
 1198: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1199: %% Triggers a Server Alert as ssl client does not have a certificate with a
 1200: %% signature algorithm supported by the server (signature_algorithms_cert extension
 1201: %% of CertificateRequest does not contain the algorithm of the client certificate).
 1202: %% ssl client sends an empty certificate.
 1203: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth() ->
 1204:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (backported to TLS-1.2) : Test client authentication with unsupported signature_algorithm_cert"}].
 1205: 
 1206: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth(Config) ->
 1207:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1208:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1209:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1210:                   {signature_algs, [rsa_pkcs1_sha256, rsa_pkcs1_sha384, rsa_pss_rsae_sha256, rsa_pss_pss_sha256]},
 1211:                   %% Skip rsa_pkcs1_sha256!
 1212:                   {signature_algs_cert, [rsa_pkcs1_sha384, rsa_pkcs1_sha512]},
 1213:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}|ServerOpts0],
 1214:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
 1215:     case Version of
 1216:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 1217:             ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_required);
 1218:         _  ->
 1219:             ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, unsupported_certificate)
 1220:     end.
 1221: 
 1222: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1223: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth() ->
 1224:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (backported to TLS-1.2): Test client authentication with unsupported signature_algorithm"}].
 1225: 
 1226: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth(Config) ->
 1227:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1228:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1229:     ClientOpts = [{signature_algs, [rsa_pkcs1_sha256, rsa_pss_rsae_sha256]} | ClientOpts0],
 1230:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1231:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_sha1, rsa_pss_pss_sha256]},
 1232:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}|ServerOpts0],
 1233:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
 1234: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1235: hello_retry_client_auth() ->
 1236:     [{doc, "TLS 1.3 (HelloRetryRequest): Test client authentication."}].
 1237: 
 1238: hello_retry_client_auth(Config) ->
 1239:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1240:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1241:     ServerOpts1 = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1242:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1243:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1244:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts0],
 1245:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1246:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true} | ServerOpts1],
 1247: 
 1248:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1249: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1250: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted() ->
 1251:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (HelloRetryRequest): Test client authentication when client sends an empty " 
 1252:        "certificate and fail_if_no_peer_cert is set to true."}].
 1253: 
 1254: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config) ->
 1255:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1256:     %% Delete Client Cert and Key
 1257:     ClientOpts1 = proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0),
 1258:     ClientOpts2 = proplists:delete(keyfile, ClientOpts1),
 1259: 
 1260:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1261:     %% Set versions
 1262:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1263:                   {verify, verify_peer},
 1264:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, false},
 1265:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1266:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1267:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts2],
 1268:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1269: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1270: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected() ->
 1271:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (HelloRetryRequest): Test client authentication when client "
 1272:        "sends an empty certificate and fail_if_no_peer_cert is set to true."}].
 1273: 
 1274: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config) ->
 1275:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1276:     %% Delete Client Cert and Key
 1277:     ClientOpts1 = proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0),
 1278:     ClientOpts2 = proplists:delete(keyfile, ClientOpts1),
 1279: 
 1280:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1281:     %% Set versions
 1282:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1283:                   {verify, verify_peer},
 1284:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 1285:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1286:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1287:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts2],
 1288:    
 1289:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_required).
 1290: 
 1291: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1292: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1() ->
 1293:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Test that the the client fails to connect "
 1294:        "if server's certificate has a key using an unsupported curve."}].
 1295: 
 1296: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1(Config) ->
 1297:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1298:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1299:     %% Set versions
 1300:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']} | ServerOpts0],
 1301:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1302:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
 1303:                                     ecdsa_secp521r1_sha512,
 1304:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}|ClientOpts0],
 1305: 
 1306:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
 1307: 
 1308: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1309: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1() ->
 1310:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Test that the the client fails to connect "
 1311:        "if server's certificate has a key using an unsupported curve."}].
 1312: 
 1313: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1(Config) ->
 1314:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1315:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1316:     %% Set versions
 1317:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']} | ServerOpts0],
 1318:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1319:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
 1320:                                     ecdsa_secp521r1_sha512,
 1321:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}|ClientOpts0],
 1322: 
 1323:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
 1324: 
 1325: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1326: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1() ->
 1327:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Test that the the client fails to connect "
 1328:        "if server's certificate has a key using an unsupported curve."}].
 1329: 
 1330: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1(Config) ->

 1336:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}
 1337:                  | ServerOpts0],
 1338:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1339:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
 1340:                                     ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
 1341:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}|ClientOpts0],

 1344: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1345: basic_rsa_1024() ->
 1346:     [{doc, "TLS 1.3 (Basic): Test if connection can be established using 1024 bits RSA keys in certificates."}].
 1347: 
 1348: basic_rsa_1024(Config) ->
 1349:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_1024_opts, Config),
 1350:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_1024_opts, Config),
 1351:     ServerOpts1 = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0],
 1352:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
 1353:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1354:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true} | ServerOpts1],
 1355:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1356: 
 1357: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1358: server_certificate_authorities_disabled() ->
 1359:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Disabling certificate_authorities extension on the server when verify_peer is set to true"
 1360:        " allows the client to send a chain that could be verifiable by the server but that would not adhere to"
 1361:        " the certificate_authorities extension as it is not part of the regular trusted certificate set"}].
 1362: 
 1363: server_certificate_authorities_disabled(Config) ->
 1364:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1365:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1366: 
 1367:     % Strip out the ClientRoot to simulate cases where the they are manually managed and
 1368:     % not expected to be included in certificate requests during mutual authentication.
 1369:     {ok, CACerts0} = ssl_pkix_db:decode_pem_file(proplists:get_value(cacertfile, ServerOpts0)),
 1370:     [_ClientRoot | ServerCACerts] = [CertDER || {_, CertDER, _} <- CACerts0],
 1371: 
 1372:     FunAndState =  {fun(_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
 1373:                             {unknown, UserState};
 1374:                        (_, valid, UserState) ->
 1375:                             {valid, UserState};
 1376:                        % Because this is a manually managed setup, we also need to manually verify
 1377:                        % an unknown_ca (ClientCert) as expected. Typically you would have custom logic
 1378:                        % here to decide if you know the cert (like looking up pinned values in a DB)
 1379:                        % but for testing purposes, we'll allow everything
 1380:                        (_, {bad_cert, unknown_ca}, UserState) ->
 1381:                             {valid, UserState};
 1382:                        (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
 1383:                             {valid, UserState}
 1384:                     end, [0]},
 1385: 
 1386:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}, {verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts0],
 1387:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}, {verify, verify_peer},
 1388:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {cacerts, ServerCACerts},
 1389:                   {verify_fun, FunAndState} | ServerOpts0],
 1390:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_required),
 1391:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, [{certificate_authorities, false} | ServerOpts], Config).
 1392: 
 1393: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1394: %% Internal functions  -----------------------------------------------
 1395: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1396: rsa_alg(rsa_pss_rsae_1_3) ->
 1397:     rsa_pss_rsae;
 1398: rsa_alg(rsa_pss_pss_1_3) ->
 1399:     rsa_pss_pss;
 1400: rsa_alg(Atom) ->
 1401:     Atom.
 1402: 
 1403: no_reuse(?TLS_1_3) ->
 1404:     [];
 1405: no_reuse(_) ->
 1406:     [{reuse_sessions, false}].
 1407: 
 1408: chain_and_root(Config) ->
 1409:     OwnCert = proplists:get_value(cert, Config),
 1410:     {ok, ExtractedCAs} = ssl_pkix_db:extract_trusted_certs({der, proplists:get_value(cacerts, Config)}),
 1411:     {ok, Root, Chain} = ssl_certificate:certificate_chain(OwnCert, ets:new(foo, []), ExtractedCAs, [], encoded),
 1412:     {Chain, Root}.
 1413:
